TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FirstMatchCodeGroup extends System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup
Public NotInheritable Class FirstMatchCodeGroup Inherits CodeGroup
public ref class FirstMatchCodeGroup sealed : System::Security::Policy::CodeGroup

summary.span: Allows security policy to be defined by the union of the policy statement of a code group and that of the first child code group that matches.

span.span: Allows security policy to be defined by the union of the policy statement of a code group and that of the first child code group that matches.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码组是代码访问安全性策略的构建基块。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每个策略级别包含可以有子代码组的根代码组。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups. 每个子代码组可以具有它们自己的子代码组;此行为扩展到任意数量的级别，从而形成一个树。Each child code group can have their own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每个代码组有一个确定是否给定的程序集属于基于该程序集的证据的成员资格条件。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it based on the evidence for that assembly. 其成员资格条件匹配给定的程序集的唯一代码组和它们的子代码组应用策略。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy. 如任何代码组，仅其成员资格条件匹配的程序集的证据时适用。Like any code group, only applies when its membership condition matches evidence for an assembly. 如果没有匹配项，它会按顺序，在出现第一个匹配项时停止测试每个子级的成员资格条件。If there is a match, it tests the membership condition of each child in order, stopping when the first match occurs. 结果是联合根代码组的策略语句和匹配该代码组的第一个子组的策略语句。The result of is the union of the policy statement of the root code group and the policy statement of the first child group of that code group that matches. 被适用于以编程方式使用的应用程序域主机可将域策略设置。 is intended for programmatic use by application domain hosts to set domain policy. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了利用的成员类。The following example shows the use of members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建的基本代码组，并应该从自定义代码组的构造函数中调用。This constructor creates a basic code group and should be called from the constructors of custom code groups. 可以使用添加子代码组方法。Child code groups can be added using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用构造函数。The following code shows the use of the constructor. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法也生成代码组，这意味着，它包含的所有对象的副本进行的深层的副本。This method makes a deep copy of the code group, meaning that copies of all objects it contains are made, as well. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法来执行的代码组的深层副本。The following code shows the use of method to make a deep copy of the code group. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

span.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 给定要加载程序集的证据，则此方法通过先检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件计算的代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的代码组，其中包括的子代码组评估的策略语句。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 对于第一个匹配项的代码组，每个子代码组的成员资格条件测试针对在其中添加; 顺序的证据仅第一个匹配项已解决的证据集。For first-match code groups, each child code group's membership condition is tested against the evidence in the order in which they were added; only the first match is resolved with the evidence set. 如果没有匹配项，则父第一个匹配项的代码组的策略语句适用。If there are no matches, the policy statement of the parent first-match code group applies. 匹配的子代码组类型确定如何应用在其下的所有子组，具体取决于如何这些子组的方法的工作原理。The matching child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the methods of these child groups work. .NET Framework 安全系统使用上的策略级别以确定要从生成的策略声明和代码为加载代码授予哪些权限请求的程序集。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly. 此操作，此方法是，如下所示：This operation of this method is as follows: 如果成员资格条件与指定的证据不匹配，则返回`null`; 否则为组的权限集返回 (P) 等于代码组的策略语句并继续。If the membership condition does not match the specified evidence, return `null`; otherwise, set the permission set to be returned (P) equal to the code group's policy statement and continue. 对于每个子代码组，使用相同的证据; 解析代码组如果结果不为`null`，返回该策略语句。For each child code group, resolve the code group with the same evidence; if the result is not `null`, return that policy statement. 如果没有子代码组匹配，则返回 P （父级的策略语句）。If no child code group matched, return P (the parent's policy statement). ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法要解决策略代码组。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve policy for the code group. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.
Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

span.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 给定要加载程序集的证据，则此方法通过先检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件计算的代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的根代码组。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 返回的代码组包含子代码组，因而也就可以有子代码组，根据需要以反映由提供的证据相匹配的代码组的完整集合。The code group that is returned contains child code groups, which in turn can have child code groups as necessary to reflect the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided. 对于第一个匹配项的代码组，每个子代码组的成员资格条件测试针对在其中添加; 顺序的证据仅第一个匹配项已解决的证据集。For first-match code groups, each child code group's membership condition is tested against the evidence in the order in which they were added; only the first match is resolved with the evidence set. 如果没有匹配项，则父第一个匹配项的代码组的策略语句适用。If there are no matches, the policy statement of the parent first-match code group applies. 匹配的子代码组类型确定如何应用在其下的所有子组，具体取决于如何这些子组的方法的工作原理。The matching child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the methods of these child groups work. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法解决匹配的代码组。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve matching code groups. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#9)]
